Turning direction: Onside

Heel:

- Axle: Onside
- Post: Offside

+-------------+-------------------------+---------------------------------------+
| Part        | Bow                     | Stern                                 |
+=============+=========================+=======================================+
| Initiation  | 45° draw                | - 45° draw                            |
|             |                         | - sweep                               |
|             |                         | - uncorrected forward stroke          |
+-------------+-------------------------+---------------------------------------+
| Placement   | stationary high brace   | - neutral stationary high brace       |
|             |                         | - neutral cross stationary high brace |
|             |                         | - Cross Christie (only Axle)          |
+-------------+-------------------------+---------------------------------------+
| Conclusion  | bow draw                | - stern draw                          |
|             |                         | - reverse cross sweep                 |
+-------------+-------------------------+---------------------------------------+

+=============+=======================================+==========================================+

+-------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
| Placement   | Stationary high brace                 | - Neutral stationary high brace          | 
|             |                                       | - neutral cross stationary high brace    |
|             |                                       | - Christie (only Tangent)                |
+-------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
| Conclusion  | (Short loaded slice and) sweep        | - Cross stern draw                       |
|             |                                       | - Reverse sweep                          |
+-------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
